synopsis: Yamato and Momonosuke look back on Oden's adventures and heroic actions throughout the world and in the Land of Wano. Yamato describes for Momonosuke all the joy and pain that his father went through during his days.

title.en: One Piece: A Comprehensive Anatomy! The Legend of Kozuki Oden!
title.jp: One Piece: Dai Tettei Kaibou! Kouzuki Oden Densetsu!
